entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023
